DOC.detailed_description: Vulvar Paget 's disease rare skin tumour generally see postmenopausal , Caucasian woman erythematous , eczematous , scale ulcerating plaque . Initial symptom irritation , burning , pain skin lesion . The origin vulvar Paget 's disease yet entirely understood . The treatment choice surgical excision , despite high recurrence rate . The mutilating consequence surgery lead impressive morbidity address , several series report use topical 5 % imiquimod cream vulvar Paget 's disease .
